Education.Grades:
A-Level Electronics (A), Math's (C), Physics (C)
10 GCSEs (Grades A, B and C)

Roles.Description: Designing, developing and maintaining software solutions used to automate the work of the delivery teams.

My main responsibility was the automation of the deployment and refreshing of clients systems and data to allow for faster promotion of new software and more reliable testing before changes that have been made make their way onto their production systems. Currently Python and MongoDB are used to complete these tasks.
Other tasks involve the customisation of clients systems. The predominant languages used in these tasks is Tcl, SQL and Fidessa's proprietary language.

During my time at Fidessa I have received two awards:
- Commitment and Dedication
- Service / Excellence

Roles.Location: Forest Row, East Sussex, United Kingdom
Roles.Description: Helped with the deployment and decommissioning of sites.

Technical Skills.Description: Originally used and picked up at University for my projects. I now use it to create automation tools for the department. Around 3-4 years ago some of the tools and scripts the department was using were migrated to Python and I was heavily involved.
Originally picked up and learnt during my time at Fidessa, so now looking at roughly 5 years of experience.
I also have some experience with a proprietary language, as Fidessa has its own in house language that is used from time to time.
Around 4 years of experience using SQL at Work.
Regex has been an incredibly useful tool to parse and manipulate data both at university and my time at Fidessa.
Perforce is the main source control software I have used at work.
